title: T206 SLers FS (new lot listed AUG 10th) All cards SOLD
author: edjs

posts.post_title: T206 SLers FS (new lot listed AUG 10th) All cards SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi guys, I'm looking to sell some of my Southern Leagues.  I accept PayPal, checks, and Money Order.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal.  Please add $2.50 for shipping, free shipping on orders of $150 or more, to include insurance.  Scans available on request.

Perdue, Raw, OM, $20
Thronton, Raw, OM, $30
Seitz, Raw, OM, $25 (suspect trimmed)
Foster, Raw, OM, $35
Jordan, Raw, OM, $25 (soaked to remove paper residue, spot of paper loss on back)
Thebo, PSA 1, OM, $45 (Nicest PSA 1 I've seen in a long time)

White, SGC 10, Pied., $40
Ryan, Raw, Pied., $30
Stark, SGC 10, Pied., $35
Westlake, SGC 10, Pied., $20

Take the whole lot for $275

PM, or e-mail for scans, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing negotiations.  Thanks for looking, and more will be listed soon, so check back often.
I will take Westlake, Mullaney and Howard,
Remaining cards prices lowered, accepting offers.  Thanks for looking.
